text: Ernst Wilhelm "Wim" Wenders (; born 14 August 1945) is a German movie director, playwright, author, and photographer. He is known for his works in Wings of Desire, The State of Things, Paris, Texas, Faraway, So Close!, and The Million Dollar Hotel. Wenders was born on 14 August 1945 in Düsseldorf, Rhine Province, Germany.Biography Wim Wenders , wim-wenders.com ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:BAFTA Award winning directors Category:Cinematographers Category:German movie actors Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German photographers Category:German screenwriters Category:Movie editors Category:Writers from Düsseldorf Category:German playwrights Category:Entertainers from Düsseldorf
title: Wim Wenders
